rows.label: qst200704_msg0001
rows.name:
Oh bother... Bother, bother...
Where'd it get off to...?

rows.label: qst200704_msg0002
rows.name:
Um...
Is it this statue you're looking for?

rows.label: qst200704_msg0003
rows.name: Th-the statue!

rows.label: qst200704_msg0004
rows.name:
Incredible! You found it!
Thank you so much!

rows.label: qst200704_msg0005
rows.name: What happened?

rows.label: qst200704_msg0006
rows.name:
I can't say I understand, myself...
Could you explain?

rows.label: qst200704_msg0007
rows.name:
Ah, beg your pardon.
I got so happy I forgot myself...

rows.label: qst200704_msg0008
rows.name:
A few days ago, I got a calling card
from Yumyum the Burglar, saying he'd
steal my statue.

rows.label: qst200704_msg0009
rows.name:
But before Yumyum could steal it,
the statue just disappeared from
before my very eyes...

rows.label: qst200704_msg0010
rows.name:
It was just too much for my poor brain;
I had no idea WHAT was going on.

rows.label: qst200704_msg0011
rows.name:
I'd been working on that piece for
nearly 20 years now, and it's still
a work in progress.

rows.label: qst200704_msg0012
rows.name:
If I can't finish my work before I die,
I bet I'll become some sort of
vengeful phantom, I'm sure of it!

rows.label: qst200704_msg0040
rows.name:
Oh, but you took it somewhere safe
for me, didn't you?

rows.label: qst200704_msg0039
rows.name:
Thanks to you, it remained safe from
the clutches of Yumyum... Praise the lord...

rows.label: qst200704_msg0041
rows.name:
I cannot thank you enough, friends!
I am in your debt!

rows.label: qst200704_msg0013
rows.name:
I, uh, I see...
All's well that ends well, hahaha...

rows.label: qst200704_msg0042
rows.name:
By the way, do you know who this
Yumyum is?

rows.label: qst200704_msg0043
rows.name:
He stole my precious food!
He's a big meanie is what he is!

rows.label: qst200704_msg0044
rows.name:
Oh, Yumyum the Burglar is quite
infamous round these parts!

rows.label: qst200704_msg0045
rows.name:
Children in particular revel in stories
of the Nopon rogue.

rows.label: qst200704_msg0046
rows.name:
They say he's a gentleman thief,
stealing treasures from villains
and giving them to poor Nopon...

rows.label: qst200704_msg0047
rows.name:
Although apparently he does also steal
from regular people sometimes.
That seems like a character flaw...

rows.label: qst200704_msg0048
rows.name: Not so!

rows.label: qst200704_msg0049
rows.name:
Sculptor! Did you not, just last week,
drink your daughter's Odifa without her
permission?! 'Tis deserved retribution!

rows.label: qst200704_msg0050
rows.name: I-it was just a sip!

rows.label: qst200704_msg0051
rows.name: 'Tis a wrong in need of righting!

rows.label: qst200704_msg0052
rows.name:
But the plan hit a snag! Who would
have thought the statue would be
snatched before I could snatch it...

rows.label: qst200704_msg0014
rows.name:
And who was it that crossed Yumyum?
It was you! Idaten!

rows.label: qst200704_msg0015
rows.name:
How long will you continue to humiliate
Yumyum the Burglar?!

rows.label: qst200704_msg0016
rows.name:
So you're the one who stole my
precious foodstuffs?!

rows.label: qst200704_msg0017
rows.name:
Ohohohoho... You finally worked it out,
you blockhead?

rows.label: qst200704_msg0018
rows.name: Took you long enough...

rows.label: qst200704_msg0019
rows.name:
The one who ransacked your food
stash...was none other than me,
Yumyum the Burglar!

rows.label: qst200704_msg0020
rows.name: Why would you do such a thing?!

rows.label: qst200704_msg0021
rows.name:
Why? Why, you shouldn't need to ask,
Idaten! You of all people should know!

rows.label: qst200704_msg0053
rows.name:
Look into your heart, you know that
of which I speak...

rows.label: qst200704_msg0054
rows.name:
Errrm...
Why did you steal my food?

rows.label: qst200704_msg0055
rows.name: Hmm...

rows.label: qst200704_msg0056
rows.name: I haven't got a clue!

rows.label: qst200704_msg0057
rows.name: You overstuffed balloony dunce!

rows.label: qst200704_msg0022
rows.name:
By winning the eating contest in the
Rumbletum Canteen, you have stolen
the Nopon's innocent hearts! Obviously!

rows.label: qst200704_msg0023
rows.name:
The cute little Nopon hearts...
Their tender little Nopon hearts...

rows.label: qst200704_msg0024
rows.name:
Those pure Nopon hearts that I,
Yumyum the Burglar, have been
unable to steal...

rows.label: qst200704_msg0025
rows.name:
You stole and defiled their hearts!
A thousand deaths would not be
sufficient punishment for you!

rows.label: qst200704_msg0026
rows.name: Oh ho ho ho...

rows.label: qst200704_msg0027
rows.name:
Hnghghgh... I see, I see...
You wish to stoke the rage of Yumyum!

rows.label: qst200704_msg0028
rows.name:
You wish to claim that you are
a better burglar than Yumyum
the, nota bene, Burglar!

rows.label: qst200704_msg0029
rows.name:
Very well, as you wish! We shall see
which of us is the superior burglar!

rows.label: qst200704_msg0030
rows.name: That's kinda sudden...

rows.label: qst200704_msg0031
rows.name: A very simple burgle-off, then!

rows.label: qst200704_msg0032
rows.name:
Obtain a Shimmering Feather from
the Ansel Hatchery in the Liberalitan
Archipelago...

rows.label: qst200704_msg0033
rows.name:
And then return to Rumbletum Canteen
before your opponent to win!

rows.label: qst200704_msg0034
rows.name:
If you can somehow prevail over
Yumyum the Burglar, I will return your
food stash to you untouched!

rows.label: qst200704_msg0035
rows.name:
Idaten will win this contest!
Nothing will stand between me and
my larder!

rows.label: qst200704_msg0036
rows.name:
H-hey now, hold up, Idaten!
You're not going alone?!

rows.label: qst200704_msg0037
rows.name:
H-hey now, hold up!
I haven't given the start signal yet!

rows.label: qst200704_msg0038
rows.name:
That's a false start! That's cheating!
Come back here, I demand a redo...!
